title: VISIT US TODAY! ELEGANT 2X2 APARTMENT AWAITS YOU!
posting_body: ["The Madison's spacious apartment homes are perfect for every lifestyle.", 'Our living spaces are bright and feature fully equipped kitchens, ample closet space, and a private patio or balcony in every home.', 'Living areas are well designed to allow for flexible furniture configurations.', 'Neighborhood shopping, dining and entertainment are just minutes away.', 'You will find all the conveniences designed for easy living here at The Madison Belmont.', 'For more details, please visit us at <URL>.', 'Call us at', 'show contact info', 'to schedule an appointment today!', '*Rental rates and availability are subject to change without notice.', 'Deposits are subject to change based on applicant qualifications.', 'Applicant must submit proof of gross income (2.5x monthly rent).', 'Apply online today: <URL>', 'Non-Refundable $45 application fee per person *Credit Screening Required*', 'Classic Unit On The 1st Floor The Above Structure.', 'Built-In-Shelves In The Living Room.', 'White Appliances.', 'Carpet Through The Unit.', 'Two Parking Spaces - One Covered/One Open.', 'Residents Are Paying  All Utilities.', 'Quiet And Friendly Neighborhood.', ' Convenient Location.', 'Close To Everything: 5 miles to Oracle, 8 miles to Facebook, 10 miles to down town Palo Alto and Stanford.', 'Walgreens, Dunkin Donuts all a block away.', 'Amenities:', '- Parking - Every Unit is Assigned One Covered Parking Stall.', 'Additional Parking Stalls Are Available to Rent', '- Pool - 2 Swimming Pools', '- Exercise Facility', '- Unfurnished', '- Smoke Free', '- Elevator in Building', '- Other amenities - Laundry Facilities', 'Appliances:', '- Dishwasher', '- Garbage Disposal', '- Range', '- Refrigerator', '- Oven', 'Lease Lengths:', '- 13 Month Lease', 'Pets:', '- Cats Allowed', '- Dogs Allowed - No Weight Limit - Breed Restrictions', '- Other pet policies - 2 Pets Max - Pet Deposit $500 - Pet Rent $65, Per Pet Per Month', 'Utilities:', '- Resident Pays Electricity', '- Resident Pays Gas', '- Resident Pays Heat', '- Resident Pays Water', '- Resident Pays Trash Pick-up', '- High-Speed Internet Available', '*photos are of a typical unit', '*pricing is subject to change', '*dates of availability are subject to change']
